scripts.compile-browser: tsc -p tsconfig.json && browserify out/index.js -o out-browser/erdjs.js --standalone erdjs
scripts.compile-browser-min: tsc -p tsconfig.json && browserify out/index.js -o out-browser/erdjs.min.js --standalone erdjs -p tinyify
scripts.compile-proto: npx pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o src/proto/compiled.js src/proto/transaction.proto && npx pbts -o src/proto/compiled.d.ts src/proto/compiled.js
scripts.compile-browser-tests: tsc -p tsconfig.tests.json && browserify $(find out-tests -type f -name '*.js' ! -name '*.net.spec.*') --require buffer/:buffer -o out-browser/erdjs-tests.js --standalone erdjs-tests
scripts.compile-browser-tests-devnet: tsc -p tsconfig.tests.json && browserify $(find out-tests -type f -name '*.js' ! -name '*.spec.*') $(find out-tests -type f -name '*.dev.net.spec.js') --require buffer/:buffer -o out-browser/erdjs-tests-devnet.js --standalone erdjs-tests
scripts.compile-browser-tests-testnet: tsc -p tsconfig.tests.json && browserify $(find out-tests -type f -name '*.js' ! -name '*.spec.*') $(find out-tests -type f -name '*.test.net.spec.js') --require buffer/:buffer -o out-browser/erdjs-tests-testnet.js --standalone erdjs-tests
scripts.compile-browser-tests-mainnet: tsc -p tsconfig.tests.json && browserify $(find out-tests -type f -name '*.js' ! -name '*.spec.*') $(find out-tests -type f -name '*.main.net.spec.js') --require buffer/:buffer -o out-browser/erdjs-tests-mainnet.js --standalone erdjs-tests
scripts.compile-browser-tests-all: npm run compile-browser-tests && npm run compile-browser-tests-devnet && npm run compile-browser-tests-testnet && npm run compile-browser-tests-mainnet
scripts.prepublish: npm run compile && npm run compile-browser && npm run compile-browser-min
